user_instruction: 'Please craft a response to Mark'"'"'s email (mark@baxterassociates.com) with some guidance on the procedural matter. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Mark’s Email & Related Notion Notes

Hi Team,

Could someone please:

1. Locate the most recent email from Mark (mark@baxterassociates.com) in my Gmail and forward or paste the full thread to me.
2. Pull any procedural-guidance notes or checklists in our Notion workspace that relate to Mark’s inquiry and share the links (or export a quick summary).

Once I have that material, I’ll draft an informed reply for him.

Thank you!

Jane
